trans-unit.source: Represents the configurable execution environment provided by the workflow run-time engine for workflows.
trans-unit.target: 代表工作流程的工作流程執行階段引擎提供的可設定執行環境。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> exposes functionality required by a host application and services to configure and control the workflow run-time engine and to be notified of changes to both the workflow run-time engine and any of its workflow instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 會公開主應用程式和服務需要的功能以設定和控制工作流程執行階段引擎，以及收到變更工作流程執行階段引擎與其任何工作流程執行個體的通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: It provides examples of how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它提供如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> 建構函式 (Constructor)、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> 方法的範例。

trans-unit.source: The code also shows the recommended way to create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object in a workflow host using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會顯示在工作流程主機中使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 方法建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 物件的建議方法。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to set event handlers for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> events.
trans-unit.target: 同時也會顯示如何設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> 事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is initialized with the default property values and contains the default core services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 是以預設的屬性值初始化，而且包含預設的核心服務。

trans-unit.source: To additionally configure the workflow run-time engine, you can add and remove services by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>, and you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要額外設定工作流程執行階段引擎，您可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> 來加入或移除服務，而且您可以設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is configured, call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> to start the workflow run-time engine and its services.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 後，呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> 以啟動工作流程執行階段引擎及其服務。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: "WorkflowRuntime"
trans-unit.target: "WorkflowRuntime"

trans-unit.source: The default core services are <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>.
trans-unit.target: 預設的核心服務有：<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: It provides an example of how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and access its methods and events.
trans-unit.target: 它提供如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> 建構函式建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 的執行個體，以及存取它的方法和事件的範例。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: The name of a valid <see langword="workflowSettings" /> section in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式組態檔中有效 <see langword="workflowSettings" /> 區段的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> class by using the specified section of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的應用程式組態檔區段，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> is initialized according to the settings in the section specified by `configSectionName` in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 在應用程式組態檔中指定之區段中的設定初始化 `configSectionName`。

trans-unit.source: `configSectionName` must correspond to a valid `workflowSettings` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: `configSectionName` 必須對應至有效`workflowSettings`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: When the workflow run-time engine is configured by using an application configuration file, it loads and instantiates classes of the types listed in the `Services` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 設定工作流程執行階段引擎時使用應用程式組態檔，載入並具現化類別類型中所列的`Services`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)

trans-unit.target: Service(NameValueCollection parameters)

trans-unit.target: Service()

trans-unit.target: 所有自組態檔載入的服務類別必須至少實作這些建構函式簽章中的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection>。

trans-unit.target: 在應用程式組態檔中找不到有效的 <see langword="workflowSettings" /> 區段。

trans-unit.target: 已存在此應用程式定義域的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> class by using the settings in the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 中的設定，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor provides a mechanism to configure the workflow run-time engine using a single method call for hosts that do not use an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式為不使用應用程式組態檔的主機提供了一個機制，可使用單一呼叫方法來設定工作流程執行階段引擎。

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons for not using the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 不使用應用程式組態檔的原因很多。

trans-unit.source: A host can run in an environment that does not allow using configuration files; for example, in trusted environments that do not allow reading from the application configuration file for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 主機可能在不允許使用組態檔的環境中執行，例如，基於安全因素而不允許從應用程式組態檔中讀取的受信任環境。

trans-unit.source: Also, a host can use a proprietary configuration mechanism; for example, the host can store the workflow run-time engine configuration settings in a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: 此外，主機可能想要使用專屬的組態機制，例如，主機可能將工作流程執行階段引擎組態設定儲存在 SQL 資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine loads and instantiates classes of the types contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.Services%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎會載入 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.Services%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 包含型別的類別，並將這些類別個體化。

trans-unit.source: When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎建構這些類別時，會依序使用下列特徵標記尋找類別建構函式：

trans-unit.source: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters)
trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters)

trans-unit.source: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)
trans-unit.target: Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)

trans-unit.source: Service(NameValueCollection parameters)
trans-unit.target: Service(NameValueCollection parameters)

trans-unit.source: Service()
trans-unit.target: Service()

trans-unit.source: All service classes that are specified in `settings` must implement at least one of these constructor signatures.
trans-unit.target: 所有在 `settings` 中指定的服務類別必須至少實作這些建構函式簽章中的其中一個。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="settings" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> already exists for this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 已存在此應用程式定義域的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to add.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要新增的服務。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的服務至工作流程執行階段引擎。

trans-unit.source: You can configure the workflow run-time engine by adding core services.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過加入核心服務來設定工作流程執行階段引擎。

trans-unit.source: Core services are those that derive from any of the following service base classes: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: 核心服務是衍生自下列任一服務基底類別 (Base Class) 的服務：<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 類別和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Core services can only be added when the workflow run-time engine is not running; that is, when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 核心服務可以只在加入工作流程執行階段引擎不在執行中;也就是說，當<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> can also be used as a storage container for other services that can be used by other workflows or by applications running on a host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 也可以當做其他服務的儲存容器使用，其他工作流程或主機上執行的應用程式也可以使用。

trans-unit.source: If you add a non-core service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class after the workflow run-time engine has been started, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method implemented by that service.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在工作流程執行階段引擎啟動後，加入衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 類別的非核心服務，則 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> 會呼叫該服務實作的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> enforces the restriction that no two services of the same <xref:System.Type> can be added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> 會強制限制不能有兩個屬於相同 <xref:System.Type> 的服務加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>。

trans-unit.source: However, you can add multiple services that derive from the same base class.
trans-unit.target: 然而，您可以加入衍生自相同基底類別的多個服務。

trans-unit.source: There can be only one service derived from each of the following service base classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 中，只能加入各一個衍生自下列服務基底類別的服務：<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 類別和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 類別。

trans-unit.source: If you add multiple services derived from one of these classes, for example two persistence services, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果加入多個衍生自這些類別其中之一的服務 (例如兩個持續性服務)，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> 會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: It provides example of how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method to add an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> to the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 提供如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> 方法，將 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> 與 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> 加入工作流程執行階段引擎的範例。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Cancelling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 已處置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is already registered with the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 已向工作流程執行階段引擎註冊。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="service" /> is a core service and the workflow run-time engine is already running (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted" /> is <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 是核心服務，而且工作流程執行階段引擎已經在執行中 (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted" /> 是 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a workflow instance by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的參數建立工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the workflow run-time engine has not been started, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> methods call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流程執行階段引擎尚未啟動，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> for a list of possible exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的例外狀況清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After you create the workflow instance, call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> method to begin its execution.
trans-unit.target: 建立工作流程執行個體後，呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法傳回之 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 物件上的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 以開始其執行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之工作流程的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new workflow instance by using the specified workflow <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的工作流程 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 建立新的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The created workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> is created, validation is executed on it.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 之前，系統會針對它執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: If any validation errors occur, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生任何驗證錯誤，就會擲回 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException>。

trans-unit.source: This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead.
trans-unit.target: 這對於簡單案例很有用，但是在伺服器環境中，針對每一個啟動過程重新驗證工作流程可能是不必要的額外負荷。

trans-unit.source: For more information about disabling validation, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.ValidateOnCreate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何停用驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection.ValidateOnCreate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the recommended way to create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object in a workflow host using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 方法的工作流程主機中，以建議的方法建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: To shut down the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> gracefully, you should only call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> after you have called <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要正常關閉 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，您應該在呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 之後呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is because calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> method alone leaves the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為，單獨呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 方法，會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 變成無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> frees the resources used by the runtime by closing open file handles, database connections, and so on, but it does not unload workflow instances, stop services, or do any of the other actions that <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> does.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 會透過關閉開啟的檔案控制代碼、資料庫連接等方法釋放執行階段使用的資源，但不會卸載工作流程執行個體、停止服務，或執行 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> 所做的任何其他動作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> should be called only when the host application must free the resources used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> before they are automatically freed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 只有當主應用程式必須在記憶體回收行程自動釋放 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 使用的資源之前進行釋放時，才應該呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>。

trans-unit.source: For general information about <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需一般資訊<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> on a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 物件上的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>。

trans-unit.source: In this sample, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> method is called from the FormClosing event handler for the main form of the application; this ensures that the objects created by the runtime are properly cleaned up when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，會從應用程式主要表單的 FormClosing 事件處理常式呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 方法。這樣可確保應用程式關閉時，會適當地清理執行階段建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: This sample is from the [Speech Application Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[語音應用程式範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that services must implement to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 服務必須實作才能傳回的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.target: 空的 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 表示沒有任何實作或衍生自指定之 <xref:System.Type> 的服務加入工作流程執行階段引擎中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> object for each workflow instance currently loaded in memory.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入記憶體中之每個工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that, unlike <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>, this method does not throw a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the runtime is not started.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，與 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> 不同的是，如果執行階段未啟動，這個方法不會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve a collection of loaded workflows from a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何從 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 物件擷取已載入之工作流程的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 已處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取服務的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a service of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> from the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 從工作流程執行階段引擎中擷取屬於指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的服務。

trans-unit.source: The service of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬於指定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetService%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if more than one service exists for the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一個以上屬於指定之 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetService%2A> 的服務，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 會擲回 <xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should use one of the overloaded methods of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A> if it is possible that multiple services of the specified type are present in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A> 有多個屬於指定型別的服務，您應該使用其中一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 的多載方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine may have multiple tracking services.
trans-unit.target: 例如，工作流程執行階段引擎可能有多個追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: If you request a tracking service by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> base class, it is possible that an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用指定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 基底類別的方式要求追蹤服務，可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> is already disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one service of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上的 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 類型的服務。

trans-unit.source: The service type.
trans-unit.target: 服務類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a service of the specified generic type from the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 從工作流程執行階段引擎中擷取指定之泛型型別的服務。

trans-unit.source: A single service of the specified generic type.
trans-unit.target: 屬於指定泛型型別的單一服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetService%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if more than one service exists for the specified generic type.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一個以上屬於指定之泛型型別的服務，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetService%2A> 會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should use one of the overloaded methods of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A> if it is possible that multiple services of the generic type are present in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetAllServices%2A> 中有多個屬於泛型型別的服務，您應該使用其中一個 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 的多載方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine may have multiple tracking services.
trans-unit.target: 例如，工作流程執行階段引擎可能有多個追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: If you request a tracking service by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> base class, it is possible that an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用指定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 基底類別的方式要求追蹤服務，可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve a single service from a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object; in this case, a service of type <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何從 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 物件擷取單一服務 (在這個案例中是 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.ManualWorkflowSchedulerService> 類型的服務)。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[工作流程執行緒範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157350)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> has already been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: More than one service of the generic type was found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上泛型型別的服務。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the workflow instance that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取有指定之 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 的工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 有指定之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: If `instanceId` specifies a workflow instance that is not currently in memory, the workflow instance is loaded into memory and scheduled for execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `instanceId` 指定目前不在記憶體中的工作流程執行個體，工作流程執行個體會載入記憶體中並排程執行。

trans-unit.source: For example, after a workflow instance is aborted, you can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> to load the workflow instance back into memory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在中止工作流程執行個體後，您可以呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A>，將工作流程執行個體載回記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the last persisted state of the workflow instance is loaded into memory by the persistence service.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況中，持續性服務會將工作流程執行個體的上次保存狀態載入記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a `ReloadWorkflow` method that calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範呼叫 `ReloadWorkflow` 方法的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The `ReloadWorkflow` method is part of a larger class that has a `Runtime` property to access all of the methods, properties, and events of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: `ReloadWorkflow` 方法屬於一個較大的類別，該類別的 `Runtime` 屬性可以存取 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 類別的所有方法、屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351)範例。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A> is redundant because both the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A> methods use the same internal helper method to load the workflow instance into memory.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A> 是多餘的，因為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.GetWorkflow%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Load%2A> 方法使用相同的內部 Helper 方法將工作流程執行個體載入記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime is not started.
trans-unit.target: 未啟動工作流程執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow run-time engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出工作流程執行階段引擎是否已啟動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow run-time engine has been started; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流程執行階段引擎已啟動則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> indicates that the workflow run-time engine services are running.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> 表示工作流程執行階段引擎服務正在執行中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `false` until the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> 是`false`直到主機呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It remains `true` until the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在主機呼叫 `true` 之前，它都會保持為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add core services to the workflow run-time engine while it is running.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎正在執行時，無法將核心服務加入到引擎中。

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: 核心服務是衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 類別和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 類別的服務。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> 物件的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，如果執行階段已啟動，則訊息會列印到主控台中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A> while the workflow run-time engine is running (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A>時工作流程執行階段引擎正在執行 (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>是`true`)。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A> 物件的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the name of the runtime is set to "Main Runtime".
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，執行階段的名稱設定為 "Main Runtime"。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試在已處置 (Dispose) 的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name" /> 上設定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name" /> while the workflow run-time engine is running occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行階段引擎執行時，嘗試設定 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要移除的服務。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service from the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 從工作流程執行階段引擎中移除指定的服務。

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove a core service while the workflow run-time engine is running (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> is `true`).
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎執行時，您不能移除核心服務 (<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>是`true`)。

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: 核心服務是衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 類別和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 類別的服務。

trans-unit.source: If `service` derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method implemented by `service`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `service` 衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 類別，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> 會呼叫由 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> 實作的 `service` 方法。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> is added and removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，將在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> 中加入並移除 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="service" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> is already disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine has started (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted" /> is <see langword="true" />) and <paramref name="service" /> is a core service.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎已啟動 (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted" /> 為<see langword="true" /> )，而且 <paramref name="service" /> 是核心服務。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="service" /> is not registered with the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="service" /> 尚未向工作流程執行階段引擎註冊。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a service that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService" /> class calls <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent(System.Exception,System.Guid)" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService" /> 類別的服務呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent(System.Exception,System.Guid)" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: A service that is derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to inform subscribers to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event that an exception that it was unable to handle occurred during its execution.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 類別的服務可以呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> 方法，以便通知 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> 事件的訂閱者，在服務的執行期間發生了無法處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to this event to implement a recovery mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 您可以訂閱此事件以實作復原機制。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a workflow instance has not been created yet by the workflow run-time engine and an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行階段引擎尚未建立工作流程執行個體且發生例外狀況時，會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the only way to inform a host application that an exception occurred is to raise this event.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，通知主應用程式發生例外狀況的唯一方法就是引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the workflow run-time engine does not call this directly.
trans-unit.target: 然而，工作流程執行階段引擎不會直接加以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the workflow run-time engine either delivers an exception to the workflow instance or, if there is no instance, throws back to the caller, which in this case is actually the service that fires this event.
trans-unit.target: 相反的，工作流程執行階段引擎會傳遞例外狀況到工作流程執行個體，如果沒有執行個體則擲回給呼叫者，在這種情況中，呼叫者實際上是引發此事件的服務。

trans-unit.source: If you create your own persistence or scheduler service, you must implement this event yourself through the base <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果建立自己的持續性服務或排程器服務，您必須透過基底 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that was using the service and the <xref:System.Exception> that could not be handled.
trans-unit.target: 若為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> 事件，寄件者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則會包含使用服務的工作流程執行個體 <xref:System.Guid> 和無法處理的 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code associates <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> with an event handler, a method named `OnExceptionNotHandled`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnExceptionNotHandled` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is started.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行階段引擎啟動時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event after it has validated the core service configuration of the workflow run-time engine, has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method implemented by each of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, and has set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>叫用事件之後驗證工作流程執行階段引擎的核心服務設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>由每個衍生自其服務實作的方法<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>類別而且已設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about the order in which the services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class are started by the workflow run-time engine, and some of these workflow run-time engine services may depend on functionality supplied by other of these services to complete their startup tasks.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎啟動衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 類別的服務時，無法保證其順序。而且這些工作流程執行階段引擎服務的其中一些服務，可能需要依賴其中的其他服務所提供的功能，來完成各自的啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: Workflow run-time engine services can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to perform any final startup tasks that require the support of other workflow run-time engine services when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎服務可以覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法，以便在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> 事件引發時，執行需要其他工作流程執行階段引擎服務支援的任何最後啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event handler is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，會將事件處理常式加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> 的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 事件中。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，處理常式是列印簡易訊息至主控台的匿名方法。

trans-unit.source: Starts the workflow run-time engine and the workflow run-time engine services.
trans-unit.target: 啟動工作流程執行階段引擎和工作流程執行階段引擎服務。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that a valid set of core services exists and then starts any services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會確認有一組有效的核心服務存在，然後啟動任何衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 類別的服務。

trans-unit.source: There must be one and only one of each of the following core services: a workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> base class and a scheduler service derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> base class.
trans-unit.target: 必須有一個，每個下列的核心服務的其中之一： 工作流程`CommitWorkBatch`服務衍生自<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>基底類別和排程器服務衍生自<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: If either or both of these core services are missing, the workflow run-time engine supplies the appropriate default service: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> for the workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService> for the scheduler service.
trans-unit.target: 如果遺漏一個或兩個這些核心服務，工作流程執行階段引擎提供適當的預設服務：<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>工作流程`CommitWorkBatch`服務和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowSchedulerService>排程器服務。

trans-unit.source: A persistence service is optional, but there can be at most only one persistence service present.
trans-unit.target: 持續性服務是選用的服務，而且最多只能有一個持續性服務。

trans-unit.source: After it has validated the service configuration, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on all of the services that are derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: 驗證服務組態後，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> 會呼叫所有衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> 類別之服務上的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the workflow run-time engine sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event.
trans-unit.target: 最後，工作流程執行階段引擎會設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> 並引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> 事件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add or remove core services after the workflow run-time engine is started.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎啟動後，無法加入或移除核心服務。

trans-unit.source: Core services are services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: 核心服務是衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> 類別、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> 類別和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> 類別的服務。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> while the workflow run-time engine is running, no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在工作流程執行階段引擎執行時呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>，則不會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> after the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> creates a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance and after it calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> to add services to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> 建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%2A> 執行個體，並且在它呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 以加入服務到執行階段中後呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It also calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> before any other processing occurs.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在發生任何其他處理之前呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 已處置。

trans-unit.source: There is more than one service workflow <see langword="CommitWorkBatch" /> service registered with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 有一個以上的服務工作流程 <see langword="CommitWorkBatch" /> 服務已向此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 註冊。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is more than one scheduler service registered with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 有一個以上的排程器服務已向此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 註冊。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is more than one persistence service registered with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.
trans-unit.target: 有一個以上的持續性服務已向此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> 註冊。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行階段引擎停止時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event after it has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method implemented by each of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> 方法會在叫用以其衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> 類別的每個服務實作的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> 方法後，引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> 事件。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about the order in which these workflow run-time engine services are stopped, and some of these services may need to preserve some functionality that is relied on by other services until they too are stopped.
trans-unit.target: 這些工作流程執行階段引擎服務的停止順序不一定，而且這些服務的其中一些服務可能需要保留一些其他服務所依賴的功能，直到其他服務停止為止。

trans-unit.source: Such services can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to perform any residual shutdown logic when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這類服務可以覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法，以在引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> 事件時執行任何剩餘的關閉邏輯。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event handler is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，會將事件處理常式加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> 的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 事件中。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，處理常式是列印簡易訊息至主控台的匿名方法。

trans-unit.source: Stops the workflow run-time engine and the run-time services.
trans-unit.target: 停止工作流程執行階段引擎和執行階段服務。

trans-unit.source: This method causes the workflow run-time engine to unload each of its workflow instances, stop all of its services that are derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class, set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to `false`, and raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會導致卸除每個工作流程執行個體，停止所有衍生自其服務在工作流程執行階段引擎<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>類別中，設定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>至`false`，並引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>事件。

trans-unit.source: To shut down the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> gracefully, call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要正常關閉 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，請先呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>，再呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Dispose%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> is called after the host has completed all other processing associated with the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在主機完成所有與執行階段相關聯的其他處理後，會呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> is already disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已經處置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 在中止工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted> occurs after all pending work for the workflow instance is cleared, but before the workflow instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted> 會發生在工作流程執行個體的所有暫止工作都已清除之後，但在工作流程執行個體於記憶體中失效之前。

trans-unit.source: You can abort a workflow instance by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 來中止工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code associates the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted> with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowAborted`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowAborted> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowAborted` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance has completed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> is raised after the workflow instance has completed but before the instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> 會在工作流程執行個體完成後，但在執行個體失效之前引發。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and its output parameters.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> 事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs> 則包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 及其輸出參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code associates the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowCompleted`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowCompleted` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCreated> event after the workflow instance is completely constructed but before activities are processed.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎會在工作流程執行個體完成建構後，但在處理活動之前引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCreated> 事件。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157352)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> functionality from a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code associates the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCreated> with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowCreated`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCreated> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowCreated` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance enters the idle state.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行個體進入閒置 (Idle) 狀態時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> event when the workflow instance enters an idle state; for example, when the workflow is waiting for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity to complete.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎會在工作流程執行個體進入閒置狀態時引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> 事件。例如，在工作流程等待 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 活動完成時。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow instance is loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行個體載入記憶體中時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> occurs after the persistence service has restored the workflow instance, but before the workflow run-time engine begins to execute any activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> 會發生在持續性服務已還原工作流程執行個體之後，但在工作流程執行階段引擎開始執行任何活動之前。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> 事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowLoaded> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowLoad` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a workflow instance is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行個體的狀態被保存時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance can be persisted for many reasons.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體可能基於多個原因而保存。

trans-unit.source: For example, the host can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on a workflow instance, or the workflow run-time engine can persist a workflow instance because the instance is idle or because an atomic scope has completed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，主機可能呼叫工作流程執行個體上的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。或者已完成不可部分完成的範圍，或執行個體已成為閒置狀態時，工作流程執行階段引擎可能會保存工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If a persistence service is present in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> is raised by the runtime after the state of the workflow instance is saved to memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 中有持續性服務，則在工作流程執行個體的狀態儲存到記憶體之後，執行階段會引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted>。

trans-unit.source: If a persistence service is not present, the event is still raised but the instance state is not saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有持續性服務存在，仍然會引發事件，但不會儲存執行個體狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event occurs because the workflow instance is being unloaded, it is followed by a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果因為正在卸載工作流程執行個體而發生 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> 事件，接著會發生 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> 事件。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> 事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when execution of a workflow instance is resumed following a suspension.
trans-unit.target: 在暫止後繼續執行工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> event just before the workflow instance is scheduled.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎會在正要排程工作流程執行個體之前引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> event is usually raised because of an explicit call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> 事件常因明確呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Resume%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 而引發。

trans-unit.source: However, the workflow run-time engine can temporarily suspend an instance to perform an operation, for example, to apply a workflow change.
trans-unit.target: 然而，工作流程執行階段引擎可能暫時停止執行個體，以便執行作業，例如套用工作流程變更。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> event is raised when the runtime resumes execution of the workflow instance following the operation.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，在作業完成後，作業階段繼續執行工作流程執行個體時，就會引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> 事件。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowResumed> 事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance has been started.
trans-unit.target: 在啟動工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowStarted> event after the workflow instance is started by scheduling the root activity for execution.
trans-unit.target: 藉由排程執行的根活動啟動工作流程執行個體後，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowStarted> 事件。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於這個事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 在暫止工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance can be suspended by the host through a call to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A> method, by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體可以由主機呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A> 方法、藉由 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 活動，或由工作流程執行階段引擎隱含地暫止。

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine temporarily suspends the instance when it applies dynamic changes to the instance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當工作流程執行階段引擎要套用動態變更至執行個體時，它會暫時停止執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and a string that describes the reason the instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 若為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended> 事件，寄件人會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而且 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> 會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 與說明暫止執行個體之原因的字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowSuspended` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 在結束工作流程執行個體時發生。

trans-unit.source: The workflow can be terminated by the host through a call to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A> method, by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, or by the workflow run-time engine when an unhandled exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生未處理的例外狀況時，工作流程可以由主機呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A> 方法、藉由 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> 活動，或由工作流程執行階段引擎加以結束。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> event after the workflow instance is terminated, but before it is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段會在工作流程執行個體結束後，但是在它於記憶體中失效之前引發 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> 事件。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> and information about the reason the instance was terminated in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若為 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> 事件，寄件者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而且 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> 會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性中執行個體結束原因的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowCompleted` 的方法) 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow instance is unloaded from memory.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程執行個體從記憶體中卸載時發生。

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance can be unloaded from memory by an explicit call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A>, or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine according to its own semantics.
trans-unit.target: 透過明確呼叫 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A> 或工作流程執行階段引擎根據本身語意的隱含呼叫，可從記憶體中卸載工作流程執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For example, the workflow run-time engine unloads a workflow instance if the instance becomes idle and the runtime has a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> added for which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnloadOnIdle%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，工作流程執行階段引擎卸載工作流程執行個體時如果執行個體變成閒置，而且執行階段<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>加入其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnloadOnIdle%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine raises the
trans-unit.target: 在成功保存工作流程執行個體的狀態後，但在執行個體於記憶體中失效之前，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event after the state of the workflow instance has been successfully persisted but before the instance is invalidated in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> event precedes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowPersisted> 事件會發生在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> 事件之前。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> event, the sender contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> 事件，傳送者會包含 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> 則包含事件關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 功能。

trans-unit.source: The code associates the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowUnload`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會使 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowUnloaded> 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowUnload` 的方法) 產生關聯。
